Source.Name: perl-io-string
Source.Summary: IO::String is a class to read or write data from in-core strings.
Source.Description: IO::String is an IO::File (and IO::Handle) compatible class that read or write data from in-core strings. It is really just a simplification of what I needed from Eryq's IO-stringy modules. As such IO::String is a replacement for IO::Scalar.

Package.Name: perl-io-string
